instructions: S November 29, 2016 at 8:28 pm How do I prove that I didn't send someone a friend request AND a message on Facebook? Reply Darryl_Gittins November 10, 2010 at 4:17 pm "Anyone not your friend on Facebook can still search and find your profile and see everything that you share with everyone?" How so? That's the default setting, but the statement is not true if you've changed your settings - as you should. Reply Fortune Articles November 10, 2010 at 6:41 am Go to the application's facebook page and click on "Block application"... Reply
